person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| trade ministers |

Explanation:
The only person entities mentioned in the paragraph are "trade ministers". They are explicitly referred to as attending the meeting and reviewing the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| trade ministers |

Explanation:
The only person entities mentioned in the paragraph are "trade ministers". The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as the WTO and GATT, are organizations and not people. Therefore, the valid entities that clearly refer to "Person" are only "trade ministers".

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Location   |
|------------|
| at the ministerial meeting |
| under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)|

The two location entities identified are "at the ministerial meeting" and "under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)". The first location entity refers to the place where the meeting will take place, while the second location entity refers to the organization where the Uruguay Round free trade commitments were implemented.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location   |
|------------|
| at the ministerial meeting |

After reviewing the paragraph again, I realized that the second location entity "under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)" is not a clear location entity. Therefore, I have removed it from the table. The only valid location entity in the paragraph is "at the ministerial meeting", which refers to the place where the meeting will take place.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| WTO |
| GATT |

Explanation:

1. WTO (World Trade Organization) - a global international organization dealing with the global rules of trade between nations.
2. GATT (General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade) - a multilateral agreement regulating international trade. It was replaced by the WTO in 1995.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| WTO |
| GATT |

Explanation:

1. WTO (World Trade Organization) - a global international organization dealing with the global rules of trade between nations.
2. GATT (General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade) - a multilateral agreement regulating international trade. It was replaced by the WTO in 1995.

Note: I have reviewed the paragraph and both "WTO" and "GATT" unambiguously refer to organizations. Therefore, no entities need to be removed.
